casebody.data:
No. 09-1298. General Dynamics Corporation, Petitioner v. United States. The Boeing Company, Successor to McDonnell Douglas Corporation, Petitioner v. United States. No. 09-1302. 561 U.S. 1057, 131 S. Ct. 62,

177 L. Ed. 2d 1151,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 5760. September 28, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit in No. 09-1298 granted limited to Question 1 presented by the petition. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit in No. 09-1302 granted limited to Question 2 presented by the petition. The cases are consolidated and a total of one hour is allotted for oral argument.

Same cases below, 567 F.3d 1340.
